|  [COMMAND](./core-utils.command.md) | Keycode for COMMAND/META key. |
|  [contains](./core-utils.contains.md) | Returns <code>true</code> if a given node contains nodes of a given <code>nodeType</code> |
|  [createDocumentNode](./core-utils.createdocumentnode.md) | Creates a document node from the passed in content and schema. |
|  [CTRL](./core-utils.ctrl.md) | Keycode for CTRL key. |
|  [endPositionOfParent](./core-utils.endpositionofparent.md) | Get the end position of the parent of the current resolve position |
|  [environment](./core-utils.environment.md) | A object with flags identifying the current environment. |
|  [findBlockNodes](./core-utils.findblocknodes.md) | Returns block descendants of a given <code>node</code>. |
|  [findChildren](./core-utils.findchildren.md) | Iterates over descendants of a given <code>node</code>, returning child nodes predicate returns truthy for. |
|  [findChildrenByAttr](./core-utils.findchildrenbyattr.md) | Iterates over descendants of a given <code>node</code>, returning child nodes predicate returns truthy for. |
|  [findChildrenByMark](./core-utils.findchildrenbymark.md) | Iterates over descendants of a given <code>node</code>, returning child nodes that have a mark of a given markType. |
|  [findChildrenByNode](./core-utils.findchildrenbynode.md) | Iterates over descendants of a given <code>node</code>, returning child nodes of a given nodeType. |
|  [findElementAtPosition](./core-utils.findelementatposition.md) | Returns DOM reference of a node at a given <code>position</code>. |
|  [findInlineNodes](./core-utils.findinlinenodes.md) | Returns inline nodes of a given <code>node</code>. |
|  [findNodeAtEndOfDoc](./core-utils.findnodeatendofdoc.md) | Finds the node at the end of the Prosemirror document. |
|  [findNodeAtPosition](./core-utils.findnodeatposition.md) | Finds the node at the resolved position. |
|  [findNodeAtSelection](./core-utils.findnodeatselection.md) | Finds the node at the passed selection. |
|  [findNodeAtStartOfDoc](./core-utils.findnodeatstartofdoc.md) | Finds the node at the start of the prosemirror. |
|  [findParentNode](./core-utils.findparentnode.md) | Iterates over parent nodes, returning the closest node and its start position that the <code>predicate</code> returns truthy for. <code>start</code> points to the start position of the node, <code>pos</code> points directly before the node.
```ts
const predicate = node => node.type === schema.nodes.blockquote;
const parent = findParentNode(predicate)(selection);

```
 |
|  [findParentNodeOfType](./core-utils.findparentnodeoftype.md) | Iterates over parent nodes, returning closest node of a given <code>nodeType</code>. <code>start</code> points to the start position of the node, <code>pos</code> points directly before the node.<!-- -->\`\`\`<!-- -->ts const parent = findParentNodeOfType(schema.nodes.paragraph)(selection); \`\`\` |
|  [findPositionOfNodeAfter](./core-utils.findpositionofnodeafter.md) | Returns the position of the node after the current position, selection or state.
```ts
const pos = findPositionOfNodeBefore(tr.selection);

```
 |
|  [findPositionOfNodeBefore](./core-utils.findpositionofnodebefore.md) | Returns position of the previous node.
```ts
const pos = findPositionOfNodeBefore(tr.selection);

```
 |
|  [findSelectedNodeOfType](./core-utils.findselectednodeoftype.md) | Returns a node of a given <code>nodeType</code> if it is selected. <code>start</code> points to the start position of the node, <code>pos</code> points directly before the node.
```ts
const { extension, inlineExtension, bodiedExtension } = schema.nodes;

const selectedNode = findSelectedNodeOfType({
  types: [extension, inlineExtension, bodiedExtension],
  selection,
});

```
 |

|  [isEmptyParagraphNode](./core-utils.isemptyparagraphnode.md) | Checks if the current node a paragraph node and empty |
|  [isMarkActive](./core-utils.ismarkactive.md) | Checks that a mark is active within the selected region, or the current selection point is within a region with the mark active. Used by extensions to implement their active methods. |
|  [isMarkType](./core-utils.ismarktype.md) | Check to see if the passed value is a MarkType. |
|  [isNodeActive](./core-utils.isnodeactive.md) | Checks whether the node type passed in is active within the region. Used by extensions to implement the <code>#active</code> method.<!-- -->To ignore attrs just leave the attrs object empty or undefined.<!-- -->"Borrowed" from \[tiptap\](https://github.com/scrumpy/tiptap) |

|  [isProsemirrorNode](./core-utils.isprosemirrornode.md) | Checks to see if the passed value is a ProsemirrorNode |

|  [isSelection](./core-utils.isselection.md) | Predicate checking whether the value is a Selection |

|  [isTextSelection](./core-utils.istextselection.md) | Predicate checking whether the selection is a TextSelection |
|  [markInputRule](./core-utils.markinputrule.md) | Creates an input rule based on the provided regex for the provided mark type |
|  [markPasteRule](./core-utils.markpasterule.md) | Creates a paste rule based on the provided regex for the provided mark type |
|  [mod](./core-utils.mod.md) | Create a consistent cross platform modifier string pattern.<!-- -->This can be used with the pressKeyWithModifier.
```ts
mod('Primary', 'A')
// => 'Control-A' // on PC
// => 'Cmd-A' // on Mac

```
 |
|  [Modifier](./core-utils.modifier.md) | Shorthand names for common modifier key combinations which should <code>just</code> work on Apple and PC. |
|  [nodeEqualsType](./core-utils.nodeequalstype.md) | Checks if the type a given <code>node</code> equals to a given <code>nodeType</code>. |
|  [nodeInputRule](./core-utils.nodeinputrule.md) | Creates an node input rule based on the provided regex for the provided node type |
|  [nodeNameMatchesList](./core-utils.nodenamematcheslist.md) | Checks to see whether the name of the passed node matches anything in the list provided. |
|  [plainInputRule](./core-utils.plaininputrule.md) | Creates an node input rule based on the provided regex for the provided node type |
|  [removeMark](./core-utils.removemark.md) | Removes a mark from the current selection or provided from to |
|  [removeNodeAfter](./core-utils.removenodeafter.md) | Returns a new transaction that deletes the node after.
```ts
dispatch(
   removeNodeBefore(state.tr)
);

```
 |
|  [removeNodeAtPosition](./core-utils.removenodeatposition.md) | Returns a <code>delete</code> transaction that removes a node at a given position with the given <code>node</code>. <code>position</code> should point at the position immediately before the node. |
|  [removeNodeBefore](./core-utils.removenodebefore.md) | Returns a new transaction that deletes previous node.
```ts
dispatch(
   removeNodeBefore(state.tr)
);

```
 |
|  [replaceText](./core-utils.replacetext.md) | Replaces text with an optional appended string at the end |
|  [schemaToJSON](./core-utils.schematojson.md) | Converts a schema to a simple json compatible object. |
|  [selectionEmpty](./core-utils.selectionempty.md) | Checks whether the selection or state is currently empty. |
|  [setPluginMeta](./core-utils.setpluginmeta.md) | Set the plugin meta data |
|  [SHIFT](./core-utils.shift.md) | Keycode for SHIFT key. |
|  [shouldUseDOMEnvironment](./core-utils.shouldusedomenvironment.md) | Checks which environment should be used. Returns true when we are in the dom environment. |
|  [startPositionOfParent](./core-utils.startpositionofparent.md) | Get the start position of the parent of the current resolve position |
|  [toDOM](./core-utils.todom.md) | Convert a node into its DOM representative |
|  [toggleBlockItem](./core-utils.toggleblockitem.md) | Toggle a block between the provided type and toggleType. |
|  [toggleList](./core-utils.togglelist.md) | Toggles a list item. |
|  [toggleWrap](./core-utils.togglewrap.md) | Toggle between wrapping an inactive node with the provided node type, and lifting it up into it's parent. |
|  [toHTML](./core-utils.tohtml.md) | Convert a prosemirror node into it's HTML contents |
|  [transactionChanged](./core-utils.transactionchanged.md) | Check to see if a transaction has changed either the document or the current selection. |
|  [updateMark](./core-utils.updatemark.md) | Update the selection with the provided MarkType |
|  [WINDOWS](./core-utils.windows.md) | Keycode for the windows key |
